name: Space Courier (Jack Mordred)
description:
The begin of a space adventure. This first version is only a endless scoring level where you avoid asteroids using your slowing down power.

Controles

"W" key to move up

"S" key to move down

"A" key to move left

"D" key to move right

"Q" key to turn left

"E" key to turn right

"Right click" on the mouse to slow down time (if you have enought energy)

Space Courier a game by Jack Mordred
